title: Forgot Password
init: OF.setActiveFootermenu();OF.setFootermenu();$('body').addClass('textured');$('#subheader').text(_(OF.page.title));$('#email_submit').touch(function(){OF.api.request('/xp/users/reset_password',{method:'PUT',params:{current_user_email:true},loader:'#submit',success:function(){OF.goBack();OF.alert(_('Success'),_('Your password has been reset and emailed to you.'));}});});$('#mobile_form_submit').touch(function(){if(!$('form').isLoading()){$('form').data('isLoading',true);OF.loader.show();$("#mobile_form_submit").html("正在重置密码...");OF.api.request('/xp/users/reset_password',{method:'PUT',httpParams:{timeout:100000},params:{current_user_mobile:true},loader:'#submit',success:function(){OF.goBack();OF.alert("提示","您的密码已重置并发送至您的手机上，请尽快进行密码修改");},failure:function(data){OF.loader.hide();$('form').data('isLoading',false);$("#mobile_form_submit").html("将重置后的密码发送到手机");OF.alert("错误提示",data.exception.message);}});}});
html:
Settings
